div.head: 腎釣
div.div: kidneys pulled upward by a hook

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: kidneys pulled upward by a hook

sense.def: Pathological Condition with a pulling pain felt in the scrotum and the lumbar and abdominal region. One of various types of shan qi 疝氣 , elevation-illness qi. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry shu jiao 蜀椒：治賁豚，伏梁氣及內外腎釣 , “It cures running piglet, hidden-beams qi and [a feeling as if] one’s internal as well as external kidneys [i.e. testicles] were pulled upward by a hook ”.
